translations: 引起大笑的趣事；（因有趣而发出的）咯咯大笑

sentences.sentence: What you can do: Yuk it up!
sentences.translation: 你可以做的是：哈哈大笑！

sentences.sentence: Hon choy so-yuk raised a question on demolition project for the old star ferry pier clock tower.
sentences.translation: 蔡素玉议员就旧天星码头钟楼拆卸工程提出一项质询。

sentences.sentence: Tung Yuk Hebei Machinery Co., Ltd., is willing to first-class products, services and your sincere Gongzhu brilliant.
sentences.translation: 河北东旭机械设备有限公司，愿以一流的产品、真诚的服务与您共铸辉煌。
